From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To generate keepalive packets on idle incoming network connections (initiated by the remote host), use the**service tcp-keepalives-in** command in global configuration mode. To disable the keepalives, use the **no** form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.

Examples: In the following example, keepalives on incoming TCP connections are generated:

RelatedCmds.description: Generates keepalive packets on idle outgoing network connections (initiated by a user).
